name: Chavcos Delivery Services
description:
Credits:

-----------------------------------------------------------

James Neild: Programming and special effects

Daniel Hardy: 3D modelling and texturing

Rowan Jackson:  Composer and UI designer

Special Guest Josh: For being a spooky man

------------------------------------------------------------

Chavcos 1 year anniversary:

1 year ago, Sir Aeron played thee WORST game ever submitted, and it made our night, but it also inspired us to do better. hopefully this time around he will get to play our game again. I would like to say that we improved... just abit.

So the UH-HEALTHABLES are back at it again.

Backstory:

After the tragic work placed accident caused by a child picking up all sorts of junk off the floor, the Chaco's business model has altered, now presenting home delivery services. You play as a new employee working on the night shift in a rather odd town.

Objective:

Deliver all the packages to each address as fast as possible, the more time you have left, the more points you earn. anything that has a red tint/ glow is interactable in some way.

Controls:

LEFT MOUSE:  Grab objects

E  : to interact with specific objects

#Note#

due to some last minuet oversights some parts of the game may be missing or buggy, the finish is at a blue door, complete u deliveries on-time to earn enough points to open it.
